Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add dual-axis merged plots with debugging and UX improvements

- Add PinMergedPlot component for merging two parameters on dual axes
- Improve line selection UX with wider clickable areas (15px) and clickable labels
- Fix database sync errors with defensive updateArea/updateLine code
- Add SQL migration scripts for missing visual property columns
- Enhance color picker with stopPropagation and z-index fixes
- Add parameter visibility checkboxes in merged plots
- Improve Y-axis title positioning
- Update merge logic to allow same parameter from different sources
- Add extensive console logging for debugging Marine Meteo data display issue
